name: Medical Style Expectations
prompt: Elaborate 5 theoretical slides where you show the Infective Endocarditis disease to medical students. Your generation should respect all detailed slide information below, including the structure as follows (do not enclose in code "```"): Slide format:""" --- **Slide {{slide_number}}: {{slide_title}}** {{slide_body}} """ ### Body Restrictions ### - Every slide_body has at most 25 words in a slide with at least 7 lines. - Use bullet-list form as the primary textual element type. - As pedagogical presentations seek attention and conveyance clarity beyond text, you are free to fill lines of any slide_body using the given structural elements (not counting to the word limit): - Images: """ **** {{image_caption}} **** """ - Tables: """ **** {{var1}}/{{var2}} **** """ - Make the slides sound complete to the readers with concise information sustained on diverse images or tables. ### Considerations & Requirements ### - All information in the generated slides should be clear, nonredundant, and appropriate to a professional and engaging medical presentation. - The first slide has the presentation overview followed by a motivational slide representing the disease incidence in Portugal. - As the last slide, the presentation takeaways are present. ### Medical Target Style ### Correct medical terminology and a rigorous, engaged tone.
